name: Mesprojetsandroid
body:
### Welcome to GitHub Pages.
Here are my android projects:

Horloge Simple (Simple clock)
------------------------------
A simple widget that displays a numeric clock. You can choose foreground and background color, you can also choose the typeface.

Colorpicker inspired by LarsWerkman/HoloColorPicker https://github.com/LarsWerkman/HoloColorPicker

Fontmanager inspired by UlduzSoft https://github.com/maplesyrup/maple-android/wiki/FontPickerDialog

Frequent launcher widget
------------------------
A widget that let you launch your most frequent applications, without the need to configure anything.
This program uses a service that regularly checks the foreground activity. Unfortunately, you cannot intercept the launch of an application for security reasons.

Comes in two flavours: 

Listview
![ScreenShot](https://github.com/lu1u/MesProjetsAndroid/blob/master/FrequentLauncherWidget/FrequentLauncherWidget/res/drawable-nodpi/preview_liste.png)

Stackview
![ScreenShot](https://github.com/lu1u/MesProjetsAndroid/blob/master/FrequentLauncherWidget/FrequentLauncherWidget/res/drawable-nodpi/preview_stack.png)
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
